# mongodb & `{mongolite}`

```
docker pull mongo:3.4
docker run -p 27017:27017 -d --name mongo --net r-db mongo:3.4
```

Try in RStudio:

``` r
library(mongolite)
a <- mongo(collection = "collection", db = "db", url = "mongodb://mongo:27017")
a$insert(iris)
a$insert(ggplot2::diamonds)
a$count()
a$find('{"cut" : "Premium", "price" : { "$lt" : 1000 } }')
```
